column1: }}'''Elboron''' was the second [[Prince of Ithilien]], and [[Steward of Gondor

Elboron was the son of [[Faramir]] and [[Éowyn]]. He became the second [[Prince of Ithilien]] and the [[Steward of Gondor]] after the death of his father in [[Fourth Age 82]]. He served as Steward to Elessar and possibly also [[Eldarion]].<ref>{{PM
Elboron was either the father or uncle of [[Barahir (grandson of Faramir)
column2: Barahir]], the grandson of Faramir who wrote ''[[The Tale of Aragorn and Arwen]]''.<ref>{{FR

column1: ''Elboron'' may mean "Enduring Star", from ''[[elen]]'' ("star") and ''[[boron]]'' ("long-lasting, enduring").

column3: Steward to the King of Gondor]]
